item.title: Find vulnerabilities in Flash SWF
item.description: As a user I would say that I don’t care about all these Flash stuff that try to catch my eyes, most of the time I have a plugin to disable them. As a developper, it reminds me the (not so good) old time when the marketing peoples always wanted to add “movement” in the website, yeah it looks so kool! As a hacker, well… I didn’t know how nice it could be, but I recently learned how to find issue in there and it’s funny as hell. I was close to the success as I quickly found 3 XSS, but unfortunately all my reports were marked as duplicate :/
